problem_names:
lemma is_thresholdI[intro]:
  assumes "ugraph_property c"
  assumes "\<And>p. \<lbrakk> nonzero_prob_fun p; p \<lless> t \<rbrakk> \<Longrightarrow> prob_in_class p c \<longlonglongrightarrow> 0"
  assumes "\<And>p. \<lbrakk> nonzero_prob_fun p; t \<lless> p \<rbrakk> \<Longrightarrow> prob_in_class p c \<longlonglongrightarrow> 1"
  shows "is_threshold c t"
translations:
lemma is_thresholdI[intro]:
  assumes "ugraph_property c"
  assumes "\<And>p. \<lbrakk> nonzero_prob_fun p; p \<lless> t \<rbrakk> \<Longrightarrow> prob_in_class p c \<longlonglongrightarrow> 0"
  assumes "\<And>p. \<lbrakk> nonzero_prob_fun p; t \<lless> p \<rbrakk> \<Longrightarrow> prob_in_class p c \<longlonglongrightarrow> 1"
  shows "is_threshold c t"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. is_threshold c t

proof (prove)
using this:
  ugraph_property c
  \<lbrakk>nonzero_prob_fun ?p; ?p \<lless> t\<rbrakk>
  \<Longrightarrow> prob_in_class ?p c \<longlonglongrightarrow> 0
  \<lbrakk>nonzero_prob_fun ?p; t \<lless> ?p\<rbrakk>
  \<Longrightarrow> prob_in_class ?p c \<longlonglongrightarrow> 1

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. is_threshold c t

proof (prove)
using this:
  ugraph_property c
  \<lbrakk>nonzero_prob_fun ?p; ?p \<lless> t\<rbrakk>
  \<Longrightarrow> prob_in_class ?p c \<longlonglongrightarrow> 0
  \<lbrakk>nonzero_prob_fun ?p; t \<lless> ?p\<rbrakk>
  \<Longrightarrow> prob_in_class ?p c \<longlonglongrightarrow> 1

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. ugraph_property c \<and>
    (\<forall>p.
        nonzero_prob_fun p \<longrightarrow>
        (p \<lless> t \<longrightarrow>
         prob_in_class p c \<longlonglongrightarrow> 0) \<and>
        (t \<lless> p \<longrightarrow>
         prob_in_class p c \<longlonglongrightarrow> 1))
